extracted-table.table-caption: Demographic data, psychological traits, and sleep evaluation (n = 29).

caption.p: Demographic data, psychological traits, and sleep evaluation (n = 29).

p.italic: BMI, body mass index; SAS, self-rating anxiety scale; SDS, self-rating depression scale; PSQI, Pittsburgh sleep quality index; POMS, profile of mood states;
Alertness, based on participants' response to on the visual analog scale (“alertness”);

The POMS scale consists of six subscales. The POMS consists of six subscales: TA, tension-anxiety; DD, depression-dejection; AH, anger-hostility; FI, fatigue-inertia; CB, confusion-bewilderment; VA, vigor-activity. TMD, the sum of this six components;

fn.label: c
fn.p: Distress based on participants' responses to AH subscale of the POMS questionnaire (“distress”).
